Class Car

java.lang.Object
  Car

public class Car
extends java.lang.Object

Class describing the basic properties of a car, including external method calls to track the fuel gauge level

Version:
v2.0 Nov 1st, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

Constructor Summary
Car()
          Default Constructor for objects of class Car
Car(java.lang.String carMake, java.lang.String carColour, int fuelGauge)
          Non-default Constructor for objects of class Car
 
Method Summary
 void drive()
          Method drive which uses one litre of fuel on each call through an external method that decrements the fuel gauge
 void fillTank()
          Method fillTank which restores one litre of fuel on each call through an external method that increments the fuel gauge
 java.lang.String getCarColour()
          Method getCarColour which returns the colour of the car as a string
 java.lang.String getCarMake()
          Method getCarMake which returns the make of the car as a string
 FuelGauge getFuelGauge()
          Method getFuelGauge which returns a FuelGauge object representing the car's fuel level
 void setCarColour(java.lang.String carColour)
          Method setCarColour which validates and sets a new value for the colour of the car from a passed in parameter
 void setCarMake(java.lang.String carMake)
          Method setCarMake which validates and sets a new value for the make of the car from a passed in parameter
 void setFuelGauge(FuelGauge fuelGauge)
          Method setFuelGauge which validates and sets a new value for the car's fuel gauge object (and thus fuel level) from a passed in object parameter

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Car

public Car(java.lang.String carMake,
           java.lang.String carColour,
           int fuelGauge)
Non-default Constructor for objects of class Car

Parameters:
carMake - A parameter holding the new make of the car
carColour - A parameter holding the new car colour
fuelGauge - A parameter holding the initial value passed to the fuel gauge constructor which becomes the initial fuel level
Method Detail

drive

public void drive()
Method drive which uses one litre of fuel on each call through an external method that decrements the fuel gauge

fillTank

public void fillTank()
Method fillTank which restores one litre of fuel on each call through an external method that increments the fuel gauge

getCarColour

public java.lang.String getCarColour()
Method getCarColour which returns the colour of the car as a string

Returns:
The return value which is the colour of the car

getCarMake

public java.lang.String getCarMake()
Method getCarMake which returns the make of the car as a string

Returns:
The return value which is the make of the car

getFuelGauge

public FuelGauge getFuelGauge()
Method getFuelGauge which returns a FuelGauge object representing the car's fuel level

Returns:
The return value which is a FuelGauge object containing a field with the current fuel level

setCarColour

public void setCarColour(java.lang.String carColour)
Method setCarColour which validates and sets a new value for the colour of the car from a passed in parameter

Parameters:
carColour - A String parameter holding the new colour of the car to be validated and used

public void setCarMake(java.lang.String carMake)
Method setCarMake which validates and sets a new value for the make of the car from a passed in parameter

Parameters:
carMake - A String parameter holding the new make of the car to be validated and used

setFuelGauge

public void setFuelGauge(FuelGauge fuelGauge)
Method setFuelGauge which validates and sets a new value for the car's fuel gauge object (and thus fuel level) from a passed in object parameter

Parameters:
fuelGauge - A FuelGauge object parameter holding the details of the car fuel gauge
